1: My heart overflows with good, my tongue writes with skill.
2: Graceful words attract lasting favor and beauty.
3: I stand ready with glory, majesty, and strength.
4: Prosper through truth, humility, and righteousness, achieving awesome deeds.
5: Righteous leadership secures peace and unites people in harmony.
6: Justice reigns forever; righteous authority guides every realm.
7: Loving what is right brings surpassing joy and honor.
8: Surround yourself with uplifting fragrance and beauty that bring joy.
9: Excellence attracts noble support and stands adorned in enduring honor.
10: I listen closely and wholeheartedly embrace my new commitment.
11: I honor my ruler with wholehearted devotion and find favor.
12: Good character attracts gifts and favor from influential people
13: Inner beauty radiates, clothing life with golden dignity.
14: Beautiful readiness receives honor, and companions joyfully follow.
15: Joyful people are welcomed into the palace
16: Children become leaders throughout the world
17: Lasting remembrance brings praise across generations.
